messages.speech:
The Access Center/Disability Services works with students with disabilities and Century College officials to resolve questions of 'reasonable accommodation' and other issues related to the college's compliance with disability laws.
http://www.century.edu/support-services/assistive-services-century-college/disability-services

An accommodation is a modification or support that gives a student with a disability an equal opportunity to participate and benefit from Century College. Accommodations are adjustments to how things are usually done. The purpose of effective accommodations is to increase a student's chances for success.
